title: Google\Cloud\Audit\AuthorizationInfo
name: AuthorizationInfo
description:
Authorization information for the operation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.audit.AuthorizationInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.resource
params.description: The resource being accessed, as a REST-style or cloud resource string. For example: bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/PROJECTID/datasets/DATASETID or projects/PROJECTID/datasets/DATASETID

params.name: data.granted
params.description: Whether or not authorization for resource and permission was granted.

params.name: data.resource_attributes
params.description: Resource attributes used in IAM condition evaluation. This field contains resource attributes like resource type and resource name. To get the whole view of the attributes used in IAM condition evaluation, the user must also look into AuditLog.request_metadata.request_attributes.
